meanings.sent1: The steamed vegetables were delicious and healthy.
meanings.sent2: I prefer steamed rice over fried rice for a lighter meal.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally steamed his glasses while cooking!
meanings.sent4: The city streets were steamed with the heat of the summer sun.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the steamed dumplings filled the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: She was steamed when her brother ate the last cookie.
meanings.sent2: He gave me a steamed look when I accidentally bumped into him.
meanings.sent3: I was so steamed that I forgot my keys inside the car.
meanings.sent4: The steamed crowd demanded answers from the politician.
meanings.sent5: His steamed expression showed his frustration clearly.

meanings.definition: Made moist or damp with steam.
meanings.sent1: The bathroom mirror was steamed after a hot shower.
meanings.sent2: The windows were steamed up from the boiling pot on the stove.
meanings.sent3: The steamed towels felt warm and comforting after a bath.
meanings.sent4: Her glasses were steamed from the sudden change in temperature.
meanings.sent5: The steamed room felt cozy and relaxing on a cold day.
